bibl.title: P. Oxy. 4711 and the Poetry of Parthenius. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXIX, 4711 (= M-P.3 1757.01; LDAB 10579). - Argues against the suggestion that the verses might be by Parthenius. Suggests a late date of composition (VIth century A.D.) and regards the fragments as a collection of διηγήματα in verse which are related to the production of progymnasmata in schools.
bibl.seg: BERNSDORFF Hans, P. Oxy. 4711 and the Poetry of Parthenius. Avec résumé en anglais.

P. Oxy. LXIX, 4711 (= M-P.3 1757.01; LDAB 10579). - Argues against the suggestion that the verses might be by Parthenius. Suggests a late date of composition (VIth century A.D.) and regards the fragments as a collection of διηγήματα in verse which are related to the production of progymnasmata in schools.
